revision.text:
{{Infobox comedian | name = Hollywood Zakoshisyoh | image = Hollywood_Zakoshishou_2017-05-15.jpg | caption = Hollywood Zakoshisyoh (May 2017) | native_name = ハリウッドザコシショウ | birth_name = Shigeki Nakazawa | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1974|2|13|df=yes}} | birth_place = [[Shimizu-ku, Shizuoka]], [[Shizuoka Prefecture]] | active = 1993– | domesticpartner = Chappa Shizuoka (G Mens)<ref name="matsuno">{{cite book|last=Matsuno|first=Daisuke|title=Geinin Binbō Monogatari|language=ja|publisher=[[Kodansha]]|page=114}}</ref> | website = {{official website|1=http://neet-project.com/profile/hollywood/|2=Profile}} }} {{nihongo|'''Hollywood Zakoshisyoh'''|ハリウッドザコシショウ|Hariuddo Zakoshishō|born 13 February 1974}} is a Japanese comedian from Shimizu-shi (now [[Shimizu-ku, Shizuoka]]), [[Shizuoka Prefecture]]<ref name="matsuno"/> who has appeared in many television variety shows, as well as television dramas, radio and web series. His real name is {{nihongo|Shigeki Nakazawa|中澤 滋紀|Nakazawa Shigeki}}. After going through [[Yoshimoto Kogyo]] and [[Watanabe Entertainment]]<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.cyzo.com/2008/09/post_918_entry.html|title="渡り鳥"ザコシショウに聞く「芸能事務所の違いってナニ？」|language=ja|publisher=Nikkan Cyzo|date=18 Sep 2008|accessdate=21 May 2018|deadurl=no|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20170914114619/http://www.cyzo.com/2008/09/post_918_entry.html|archivedate=14 September 2017|df=}}</ref>, he currently belongs to the SMA NEET Project. His stage name during his ''kombi'' years was {{nihongo|'''Zakoshisyoh'''|ザコシショウ|Zakoshishō|There was also the notation {{nihongo|"Zako Shishō"|ザコ師匠||Zako Master}}}}. His is nicknamed {{nihongo|"Zakoshi,"|ザコシ}} "Zakoshisyoh". Martial artist [[Shinya Aoki]] is his cousin.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.tokyo-sports.co.jp/entame/entertainment/515302/|title=Ｒ‐１優勝ハリウッドザコシショウ 格闘家・青木真也のいとこだった|language=ja|publisher=Tokyo Sports|date=7 Mar 2016|accessdate=21 May 2018|deadurl=no|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20180215204133/https://www.tokyo-sports.co.jp/entame/entertainment/515302/|archivedate=15 February 2018|df=}}</ref>
His stage name was derived from the fact that [[Hulk Hogan]] has identified himself as '''Hollywood''' Hulk Hogan at the time when [[New World Order (professional wrestling)|nWo]] was formed.<ref>{{cite news|title=R-1王者ザコシショウの芸人風雲録|work=Nikkan Gendai|date=14 Jul 2016|page=9|language=ja|number=3}}</ref>
==Appearing programmes== ===Variety=== *''On-air Battle+' ([[NHK General TV|NHK-G]]) KO winner 0 wins 1 loss; maximum 261 KB *''Yoshimoto Chōgōkin K-KenKoba Daiō'' *''Yarisugi Koji'' ([[TV Tokyo|TX]]) *''Arabiki-dan''<ref name="matsuno"/> ([[TBS Television|TBS]]: 10 Oct 2010 – 27 Sep 2011) — Performer with the most performances in the programme. Co-starred with "Zakoba with Beichō", Zakoba, and Takeshi Nadagi. *''Enta no Tenshi'' (NTV)...catch copy is "Chameleon Jūsensha" *''Jichael Mackson'' ([[Mainichi Broadcasting System|MBS]]: 20 Feb 2008) — part of the former G Mens *''Game Record GP'' (Mondo21: 17 Feb 2008 –) *''Owarai Zukan Hamanuki'' ([[Television Kanagawa|tvk]]) *''[[Waratte Iitomo!]]'' (CX, 27 Mar 2008) *''Jagaimon'' (TeleAsa Channel, 25 Dec 2008) *''Goro Presents My Fair Lady'' (TBS) *''Cunning no Renai Chūdoku'' ([[GyaO|GyaO!]]) *''Kyakure-ga'' ([[Asahi Broadcasting Corporation|ABC]], 13 Aug 2010) *''Hitoshi Matsumoto no Marumaru Hanashi'' ([[Fuji TV|CX]], 5 Aug 2011) *''Docking 48'' ([[Kansai Telecasting Corporation|KTV]], 23 Aug 2011) *''Ameagari Ketsushitai no Talk Bangumi Ametalk!'' Tachiguisoba Geinin (EX, 6 Oct 2011) *''Pierre Taki no Shonnai TV'' ({{abbr|SATV|Shizuoka Asahi Television}}, 10 Jan 2013 –) — Occasional appearances as self-proclaimed quasi-regular *''[[Downtown no Gaki no Tsukai ya Arahende!!]]'' (NTV, 3 Feb 2013 – 3 Apr 2016) *''Mabatakī'' (CX, 27 Mar 2013) *''Team Ariyoshi: Marumaru shitara Sokuintai Special'' (TBS, 9 Jan 2015) *''Sakurai-Ariyoshi Abunai Yakai'' (TBS, 4 Jun 2015) *''Kosokoso Chaplin, Jiwajiwa Chaplin'' (TX) — First victory at broadcasting session on 12 February 2017 *''Downtown Now'' (CX, 18 Mar 2016) *''[[Kanjani8 no Janiben]]'' (KTV, Apr 2016) *''Bakushō Sokkuri Monomane Kōhaku Uta Gassen Special'' (CX, 6 May 2016) *''Chō Hamaru! Bakushō Chara Parade'' (CX) *''R-1 Grand Prix 2016 Yūshō-sha Tokuban Ureteru Yatsura ni Manabu! Hollywood Zakoshisyoh TV no Okite'' (KTV—CX, 12 Jun 2016) *''[[Wednesday's Downtown]]'' (TBS, 7 Dec 2016 —) — Occasional appearances
===TV dramas=== *''Tetsuko no Sodate-kata'' (Apr—Jun 2014, [[Nagoya Broadcasting Network|NBN]]) *''Boku no Yabai Tsuma'' (Jun 2016, KTV)
===Radio programmes=== *''Mana Sakura—Hollywood Zakoshisyoh no Asamade Maruhadaka!'' (3 (late at 2nd) Apr — 25 (late at 24th) Sep, [[Nippon Cultural Broadcasting|NCB]])
===Webcasts=== *''Namaiki! Arabiki-dan'' (2012—14, YNN, TBS Channel) *''Hitoshi Matsumoto presents Documental'' (2018, Amazon Prime Video) — Season 5<ref>{{cite web|url=https://natalie.mu/owarai/news/278848|title=ジュニア、ザコシ、かまいたち山内ら初参戦「ドキュメンタル」シーズン5本日配信（コメントあり）|work=Owarai Natalie|language=ja|date=20 Apr 2018|accessdate=30 May 2018|deadurl=no|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20180422202708/https://natalie.mu/owarai/news/278848|archivedate=22 April 2018|df=}}</ref>
==Other works== ===CD=== *Gokiburi Otoko<ref>{{cite web|url=http://natalie.mu/owarai/news/217244|title=ザコシ楽曲「ゴキブリ男」MV公開、石野卓球「売れるわけねえだろ！」|work=Owarai Natalie|language=ja|date=18 Jan 2017|accessdate=2 Jun 2018|deadurl=no|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20170118103537/http://natalie.mu/owarai/news/217244|archivedate=2017-01-18|df=}}</ref> (18 Jan 2017, Sony Music Labels Inc.)
===DVD=== *''Hollywood Zakoshisyoh no Monomane 100 Renpatsu Live'' (6 Jul 2016, Aniplex) *''Choppiri Hazukashīkedo Waratte Hoshīkara Mite hoshī'' (17 Feb 2017, Goma-Books)<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.goma-books.com/archives/47861|title=バイきんぐ等人気芸人のレア映像を収録！ DVD『ちょっぴり恥ずかしいけど笑ってほしいから見てほしい ―SMAお笑いカーニバル総集編―』が、Amazon DOD（ディスク・オン・デマンド）で発売!!|work=Goma-Books Portal Site|language=ja|date=1 Feb 2017|accessdate=30 May 2018|deadurl=no|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20170314155115/http://www.goma-books.com/archives/47861|archivedate=14 March 2017|df=}}</ref>
==Award history== *''Arabiki-dan'' presents Ara-1 Grand Prix 2014 Victory *2nd Hollywood Zakoshisyoh's Wameki-1 Grand Prix Victory *Shimokitazawa Daiko Line Intermission VTR Award Victory *''R-1 Grand Prix'' Victory<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.oricon.co.jp/news/2068058/full/|title=『R-1ぐらんぷり』ハリウッドザコシショウが初優勝|work=Oricon Style|language=ja|publisher=Oricon|date=6 Mar 2016|accessdate=2 Jun 2018|deadurl=no|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20160307104536/http://www.oricon.co.jp/news/2068058/full/|archivedate=2016-03-07|df=}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.oricon.co.jp/news/2068057/full/|title=ハリウッドザコシショウ、R-1特需に期待 妻は双子を妊娠中「バイトやめたい」|work=Oricon Style|language=ja|publisher=Oricon|date=7 Mar 2015|accessdate=2 Jun 2018|deadurl=no|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20160307110838/http://www.oricon.co.jp/news/2068057/full/|archivedate=2016-03-07|df=}}</ref> *Documental Season 5 Victory
